org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeBaseProcessEvent

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeEvent
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeBaseProcessEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBaseProcessEvent, IAeEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeProcessEvent, AeProcessInfoEvent
public abstract class AeBaseProcessEvent
extends AeEvent
implements IAeBaseProcessEvent

A base class impl for process events.

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String mAncillaryInfo
          Extra info registered wih the event by the triggerer.
private  int mEventID
          The ID of the event being triggered as defined in the interface.
private  java.lang.String mFaultName
          The Fault associated with this event, if any.
private  java.lang.String mNodePath
          The path of the bpel object triggering the event (xpath)
private  long mProcessID
          The process ID of the event being triggered.
